JIRA_EMAIL: email address for the Atlassian account you're using to create the token
INCLUDE_ATTACHMENTS: include jira attachments? this will make the backup size bigger - true / false
DOWNLOAD_LOCALLY: download the backup file to backups folder? true / false

UPLOAD_TO_S3.AWS_ACCESS_KEY: not mandatory if already set on the machine with AWS CLI
UPLOAD_TO_S3.AWS_SECRET_KEY: not mandatory if already set on the machine with AWS CLI
